theatre Arts production  destigmatizes mental health at Moorpark College

How SZA made her mark with the coveted 

Harry Styles concludes residency tour with  soldout shows at the Kia Forum



The musical Chicago will be debuting March  at the Performing Arts Center PERIOD

Approximately  students are preparing and rehearsing for their debut of the popular musical comedy PERIOD The student actors are also fulfilling the roles of costume designers makeup artists stage hands musicians and producers PERIOD All areas of the theater department are all working as a team to produce the musical comedy PERIOD

Chicago named after the city takes place during the 1920s and involves a risqu chorus girl who gets caught up in a murder PERIOD Upon conviction she goes to prison and by concocting a scheme with her cunning lawyer ends up free PERIOD

The stage version is more engaging and lively than the movie said Director John Loprieno an acting teacher at Moorpark College PERIOD The movie is bland and this is a vaudeville setting PERIOD So were making the theatrer look like an old vaudeville house PERIOD This is one of the biggest productions Ive done. chicago the musical opens March  and will run through April  PERIOD To experience the Moorpark Theater Departments performance you may purchase tickets or receive more information about the performances on thePerforming Arts Center Website PERIOD
